text: Wendell Eugene (October 12, 1923 â€“ November 7, 2017) was an American jazz trombonist. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. He was a popular trombonist on the New Orleans jazz scene and recorded with artists such as Lionel Ferbos, Harold Dejan, and Kermit Ruffins. Eugene died on 7 November 2017 in New Orleans of pneumonia at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:American jazz musicians Category:American trombonists Category:Musicians from New Orleans
title: Wendell Eugene
